alert.note: Alert for Palm Beach (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 4:59PM EDT until May 24 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Palm Beach County in southeastern Florida... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 459 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Belle Glade, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Belle Glade, Pahokee, South Bay, Okeelanta and Belle Glade Camp. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
